item.title: OpenXml.ShapeDefinition
item.description: [TOC] Shape Definitions And Attributes The Coordinate Systems The Document Coordinate System (0,0) in the upper left of the document x++, move right y++, move downwards Unit EMUs 1 pixel= 9525 EMUs 1 cm= 360000 EMUs 1 inch = 914400 EMUs The Shape Coordinate System When get the width and height (0,0) in the upper left of the shape Unit: EMUs The Path Coordinate System (0,0) in the upper left of the shape
